application.controller

Class LocalCatalogController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.controller.LocalCatalogController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class LocalCatalogController
extends Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is the controller of the Local catalog. It controls all the buttons and the list views to allow the user to update, delete and view the STIGs.
    Author:
    Brandon Chung, Leon Le, Ismail Celik

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private javafx.scene.control.ListView<String> STIGCatalogListView

      LocalCatalogController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DeleteSTIG()
      This method deletes the STIG file that is highlighted on the list view and calls upon the uploadSTIGCatalog to update the listView and arraylist.
      (package private) void GoToMainMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When you're on the local catalog, the main menu button when pressed will take you back to the main menu.
      (package private) void GoToSTIGViewer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method allows you to go to the STIGView once you select a certain .xml file on the list view and click on the view button.
      void initialize(URL arg0, ResourceBundle arg1)
      Initializes the listview and arraylist with however many .xml files are in the directory
      (package private) void updateSTIGCatalog()
      This method updates the arraylist and listview.
      (package private) void UploadSTIG()
      This method uploads the STIG file selected by the user and updates the arraylist and listview to add the xml file.

    • Method Detail

      • GoToSTIGViewer

        void GoToSTIGViewer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
             throws IOException,
                    ParserConfigurationException,
                    SAXException
        This method allows you to go to the STIGView once you select a certain .xml file on the list view and click on the view button. It throws an exception if there is an issue loading a file in.
        Parameters:
        event - , This event is from clicking on the button to go to switch the view to the STIG viewer.
        Throws:
        IOException - when there is an issue loading the STIG file.
        ParserConfigurationException - when there is an issue with configuration.
        SAXException - when there is an issue with the XML parser or the application.

      • GoToMainMenu

        void GoToMainMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
           throws IOException
        When you're on the local catalog, the main menu button when pressed will take you back to the main menu.
        Parameters:
        event - , Even is from clicking the button to go back to the main menu.
        Throws:
        IOException - throws an exception when there is problem loading in the fxml file.

      • UploadSTIG

        void UploadSTIG()
         throws IOException
        This method uploads the STIG file selected by the user and updates the arraylist and listview to add the xml file.
        Throws:
        IOException - throws an exception if there is an issue loading in the STIG.

      • DeleteSTIG

        public void DeleteSTIG()
        This method deletes the STIG file that is highlighted on the list view and calls upon the uploadSTIGCatalog to update the listView and arraylist.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(URL arg0,
                       ResourceBundle arg1)
        Initializes the listview and arraylist with however many .xml files are in the directory
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • updateSTIGCatalog

        void updateSTIGCatalog()
        This method updates the arraylist and listview.
